text:
Happened in 2024.

Went down to the shop for exchange but got denied. They claimed we should place it inside the fridge.

Oh well. They kept the advice slip inside the packaging. Who knows? We had to throw out 2 bags.

Since then, we have been telling friends and relatives to avoid this brand cos get moldy easily.
We have since fall in love with
品原 Bak Kua!

(I ask that’s how your lose customer?)

If you crave for freshly grilled Bak Kwa on a lazy Sunday afternoon and don’t feel like travelling out, this is a the perfect choice. Though it is sliced (versus minced) version, the meat is soft and so well grilled. And it is still piping hot when delivered. It is a perfect treat to go with a Médoc wine.
Bad service from the lady staff named Hong Shan. Stood there idling letting the other guy did all the work while letting customers wait. Zero initiative. Where did all the friendly aunties go?
